Record.ClassificationPath: Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Heart Valve Diseases/Pulmonary Valve Stenosis/Pulmonary Subvalvular Stenosis
Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Ventricular Outflow Obstruction/Pulmonary Valve Stenosis/Pulmonary Subvalvular Stenosis
Record.Description: Narrowing below the PULMONARY VALVE or well below it in the infundibuluar chamber where the pulmonary artery originates, usually caused by a defective VENTRICULAR SEPTUM or presence of fibrous tissues. It is characterized by restricted blood outflow from the RIGHT VENTRICLE into the PULMONARY ARTERY, exertional fatigue, DYSPNEA, and chest discomfort.
